attributes.action: reject the logo for the London 2012 Olympics and open a competition to select a new logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The London 2012 Olympic logo is an embarrassment to London, to British design and to the Olympic movement.  The government should listen to overwhelming public hostility and admit that the logo is terrible and needs replacing, and immediately start a public competition to choose a new, better logo.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
